item.description:
Join hiker and outdoor enthusiast, James Bode, as he recounts his 2,650 mile hike north from the US/Mexican boarder to Vancouver Canada along the Pacific Crest Trail. The Pacific Crest Trail (PCT) runs 2,650 miles from the US/Mexican border in Southern California, through the states of California, Oregon, and Washington, to the US/Canadian border in Vancouver. It passes through varied terrain and beautiful scenery. Come learn about the history of national scenic trails; the gear and planning needed for such an undertaking; and what it is like to be out there in it.

This program is being offered for free.

While you can use this listing here on the Random Hikers site to communicate with other members who might be going you will need to register directly with REI to participate in the class using the link below.

  • http://www.rei.com/event/48743/session/66184

Space is limited so don't delay.

Store Information - contact them directly of you have any questions.

  • Boston REI Store
    401 Park Drive
    Boston, MA 02215
    (617) 236-0746
item.name: Boston REI — Hiking the Pacific Crest Trail
